enter_name_to_join: Enter your name to join the survey
waiting_room_info: You'll be placed in a waiting room until the survey starts
follow_instructor: Follow along with the instructor's guidance
start_immediately: You'll start the survey immediately after joining
complete_own_pace: Complete the survey at your own pace
auto_advance: Questions will auto-advance when time expires
question: Question
access_via_link: Access via the join link above
enter_publicsurvey_code: Or visit the app and enter survey code
wait_in_lobby: Wait in the lobby until you start the survey
join_anytime_scheduled: Can join anytime within the scheduled period
waiting_admin_start: Waiting for admin to start the survey...
connection_lost: Connection lost. Please check your internet connection.
admin_disconnected_text: The survey admin has disconnected. The survey may be paused.
name_conflict_text: Someone else is using this name. Please choose another name.
publicsurvey_full_text: This survey session is full. Please try again later.
finish_publicsurvey_confirm_text: This will end the survey for all participants.
name_required: Please enter a name with at least 2 characters.
check_information: Please check your information and try again.
name_already_taken: This name is already being used by another participant. Please choose a different name.
publicsurvey_already_started: This survey has already started and is no longer accepting new participants.
publicsurvey_in_progress: This survey session is currently in progress.
publicsurvey_code_invalid: No survey found with this code. Please check the code and try again.
publicsurvey_scheduled_wait: This survey is scheduled but has not started yet. Please wait for the scheduled start time.
publicsurvey_session_ended: This survey session has ended and is no longer available.
publicsurvey_cancelled_admin: This survey session has been cancelled by the administrator.
no_completed_publicsurveys_found: No completed surveys found for this department.
no_completed_mode_publicsurveys_found: No completed {{mode}} surveys found for this department.
manage_view_results: Manage and view survey results for your department
publicsurvey_completed_desc: Great job! You've finished the survey.
please_wait: Please wait for the scheduled start time

publicsurvey_not_started_message: This survey has not started yet. Please wait for the scheduled start time.

confirm_submit_message: Are you sure you want to submit the survey?
no_answers: Please answer at least one question before submitting.
